# StopwatchExtensions.GetElapsedAndRestart method

Gets the total elapsed time measured by the current instance and restart the instance.

```csharp
public static TimeSpan GetElapsedAndRestart(this Stopwatch stopwatch)
```

| parameter | description |
| --- | --- |
| stopwatch | The current instance to restart. |

## Return Value

A read-only TimeSpan representing the total elapsed time measured by the current instance.
